argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_resubdrg | |- ( RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ RRfld e. DivRing ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simpli | |- RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 5 |  | #P_3simpc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> ( B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_simpri | |- RRfld e. DivRing |
| 7 |  | #P_rebase | |- RR = ( Base ` RRfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` RRfld ) = ( Unit ` RRfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_re0g | |- 0 = ( 0g ` RRfld ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_drngunit | |- ( RRfld e. DivRing -> ( B e. ( Unit ` RRfld ) <-> ( B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( B e. ( Unit ` RRfld ) <-> ( B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> B e. ( Unit ` RRfld ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-refld | |- RRfld = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 14 |  | #P_cnflddiv | |- / = ( /r ` CCfld ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( /r ` RRfld ) = ( /r ` RRfld ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 8, 15 | #P_subrgdv | |- ( ( RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ A e. RR /\ B e. ( Unit ` RRfld ) ) -> ( A / B ) = ( A ( /r ` RRfld ) B ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 4, 12, 16 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> ( A / B ) = ( A ( /r ` RRfld ) B ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ B =/= 0 ) -> ( A ( /r ` RRfld ) B ) = ( A / B ) ) |
